title: The Hair Loft, Public Transportation Available, Intercoms
posting_body: ['Life at The Vantage is like nothing else in northeastern Ohio!', 'Our resort-like apartment community is ideally located a short drive from downtown Cleveland and just off I-271, making it getting around the Cleveland area easy.', 'Convenience is key at The Vantage, with Beachwood Place shopping mall located directly across the street and the Cleveland Clinic just minutes away.', 'Property Amenities:', 'Swerve Grille', 'Heated Garages', 'Recreational Areas', 'Anthea Spa', 'Gated Community with Controlled Access', 'The Hair Loft', 'Heated Underground Walkways', 'Eyeware at The Vantage', 'Indoor and Outdoor Pool', 'Pilates Studio', 'Public Transportation Available', 'Sauna and Whirlpool Spa', 'Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.', 'Photos may not be of your exact home.', 'Please contact us today for the most up to date information!', 'Professionally managed by GoldOller Real Estate Investments, a provider of Fair Housing and Equal Opportunity.']
